meanings.sent1: She swinks in the fields under the hot sun.
meanings.sent2: He always swinks diligently to complete his tasks on time.
meanings.sent3: The ant swinks tirelessly to gather food for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her determination swinks like a steady flame, never wavering.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her swinks echoed through the quiet forest.

meanings.sent1: The swinks of the construction workers built the sturdy bridge.
meanings.sent2: His success was a result of years of swinks and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The swinks of baking a cake paid off when it turned out delicious.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, swinks are the seeds that bloom into achievements.
meanings.sent5: The swinks of the students shone brightly in their final projects.
